name: Federico Marchetti
title: Full-Stack Developer
summary: Experienced Full-Stack Developer specializing in building modern web applications with React, .NET, and Azure cloud services. Passionate about creating scalable, performant solutions with clean architecture and excellent user experiences. Strong focus on TypeScript, serverless architectures, and DevOps practices.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description: Architected and developed enterprise-scale web applications using React, TypeScript, and .NET Core
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, reducing deployment time by 60%
Led migration of monolithic applications to microservices architecture on Azure
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to maintain high code quality standards

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Developed responsive web applications using React and ASP.NET Core
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways for e-commerce platforms
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, improving performance by 40%
Collaborated with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces

experience.title: Junior Developer
description: Built and maintained web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
Participated in agile development processes and daily stand-ups
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code reliability
Contributed to open-source projects and internal tool development

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in Software Engineering and Cloud Computing. Thesis on microservices architecture patterns.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: Foundation in computer science fundamentals, algorithms, and software development.

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
